General.Name: Melon SA
General.Description: Melon S.A., through its subsidiaries, produces and sells cement, ready-mix concrete, and aggregates in Chile. The company operates through two segments, Cement and Aggregates. Its products are used in high-rise building, civil works, industrial, mining, port, and household. Melon S.A. also sells its products online through the melononline.cl portal. The company was formerly known as Empresas Melón S.A. and changed its name to Melon S.A. in August 2009. Melon S.A. was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Santiago, Chile. The company is a subsidiary of Inversiones Cordillera del Sur II Spa.
General.Address: Isidora Goyenechea 2800, Santiago de Chile, Chile

4.Name: Ms. Carolina Orrego Ceballos
